alert.note: Alert for San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Santa Cruz Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 12:51PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Alameda, northwestern San Mateo and San Francisco Counties through 115 PM PST... At 1251 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from San Francisco to Pacifica to 9 miles southwest of El Granada. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Francisco, Daly City, San Mateo, Redwood City, South San Francisco, San Bruno, Pacifica, Foster City, Burlingame, San Carlos, Belmont, Millbrae, Half Moon Bay, Hillsborough, Woodside, Highlands-Baywood Park, El Granada, Brisbane, Colma and Moss Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Santa Cruz Mountains
